Package org.apache.ignite.ml.nn.trainers.distributed

Contains multilayer perceptron distributed trainers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMLPGroupUpdateTrainerInput
    Abstract class for MLPGroupUpdateTrainer inputs.
    MLPCache
    Cache for distributed MLP.
    MLPGroupTrainingCacheValue
    Value of cache used for group training by MLPGroupUpdateTrainer.
    MLPGroupUpdateTrainer<U extends Serializable>
    Update-based distributed training of MLP.
    MLPGroupUpdateTrainerDataCache
    Cache used for storing data for MLPGroupUpdateTrainer.
    MLPGroupUpdateTrainerLocalContext<U>
    Local context for MLPGroupUpdateTrainer.
    MLPGroupUpdateTrainingContext<U>
    Context extracted in distribute phase of training loop step in MLPGroupUpdateTrainer.
    MLPGroupUpdateTrainingData<U>
    Multilayer perceptron group update training data.
    MLPGroupUpdateTrainingLoopData<P>
    Multilayer perceptron group update training loop data.
    MLPMetaoptimizer<P>
    Meta-optimizer for multilayer perceptron.

Package org.apache.ignite.ml.nn.trainers.distributed Description

Contains multilayer perceptron distributed trainers.
